description: Dani gives you Dani. Not fake, not acting, just the pure essence that is her. She is a playful creature that enjoys being made to suffer until she cries. She wants to be restrained to ensure that the suffering and torment are inescapable. She craves the pain; not a lot, but just enough to bring her to tears. She finds comfort in her suffering and then smiles again when the orgasms are ripped from her pussy.
title: Playful Creature
